title: Mock Draft Monday: Virtual Pro Days, Big Board, NFC/AFC West Team Needs (Football 4/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by draft experts Ryan Wilson and R.J. White for the penultimate edition of 'Mock Draft Monday'. First, the guys discuss 'Virtual Pro Days' focusing in on Tua Tagovailoa and his weekly stock update. Then, we take a look at Ryan's Big Board and how that differs from his Mock Draft results. Then, Will, Ryan and R.J. address the biggest needs and potential fits for all NFC West teams: Cardinals, 49ers, Rams, Seahawks. That's followed by analysis of the AFC West: Chargers, Raiders, Broncos, Chiefs.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilson, @rjwhite1
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
